function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of reported information on EV charging capability may lead to unmonitored and unregulated usage, increasing the risk of contagious disease spread through surface contact on EV charging stations.","Impact":"Unregulated EV charging may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases among occupants and visitors.","Mitigation":"Ensure clear communication and education to occupants about the availability and use of EV charging stations, including guidelines for hygiene and sanitation.","Technologies":"Digital signage, mobile applications for facility information, and communication systems for building occupants.","People":"Occupants, visitors, and maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building management and facility maintenance team."},{"Description":"Partial building fault detection process may result in undetected issues with HVAC systems, leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","Impact":"Undetected HVAC faults may contribute to the spread of airborne diseases and discomfort among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Implement a comprehensive fault detection and diagnostic system for HVAC equipment to ensure early identification and resolution of issues.","Technologies":"Building automation systems with advanced fault detection algorithms and sensors for real-time monitoring.","People":"Building maintenance staff and HVAC technicians.","Owner":"Facility management and building maintenance team."},{"Description":"Inability to simultaneously heat and cool rooms may lead to inconsistent temperature control, creating discomfort for occupants and potentially impacting their immune response, thereby increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Inconsistent temperature control may compromise occupants' comfort and immunity, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Invest in advanced HVAC zoning systems and building automation controls to enable simultaneous heating and cooling based on occupancy and thermal load.","Technologies":"Smart zoning controls, occupancy sensors, and advanced building automation software.","People":"Occupants, building management, and maintenance staff.","Owner":"Facility management and building automation experts."}]}
